mapper.select: select s.num,s.name ,co.coursename ,sco.scores from clas_cour_teach cct inner join stu s on s.classid = cct.classid and s.gradeid = cct.gradeid inner join stu_cour_sco scs on scs.stuid = s.num and scs.courseid = cct.courseid inner join score sco on sco.scoreid = scs.scoreid INNER JOIN course co on cct.courseid = co.courseid where cct.gradeid=#{0} and cct.classid=#{1} and co.coursename =#{2}
